not_bot_channel: Ich darf in diesem Kanal keine Befehle ausführen, bitte schreiben Sie es noch einmal in
wrong_channel: Ich darf in diesem Kanal diesen Befehltyp nicht ausführen, bitten schreiben Sie es noch einmal in
not_quiz_channel: Es wurde noch kein Quiz-Kanal registriert!
no_tra_channel: Ein Papierkorb-Kanal muss registriert werden, bevor diese Funktionalität genutzt werden kann!
level_system_not_enabled: Das Stufensystem muss aktiviert werden, bevor dieser Befehl verwendet werden kann!
param_not_found: Parameter nicht gefunden! Bitte versuchen Sie es erneut!
already_muted: Der Benutzer **{}** ist bereits geblockt worden!
low_privileges: Der Benutzer **{}** kann nicht blockiert werden, weil die aktuellen Rollenprivilegien zu niedrig sind!
no_mute_role: Keine Rolle zum Blockieren gefunden! Bitte registrieren Sie eine Rolle um Benutzer zu blockieren, bevor Sie fortfahren!
missing_permission: Weitere Berechtigungen erforderlich! Bitte aktivieren Sie die folgende Berechtigung und versuchen Sie es dann erneut:
missing_permission_in: Die Berechtigung {} ist erforderlich! Bitte versuchen Sie es erneut, nachdem Sie diese Berechtigung gesetzt haben für den Textkanal
cooldown: Dieser Befehl hat derzeit eine Abklingzeit, bitte versuchen Sie es später noch einmal!
general_error: Es ist ein interner Fehler aufgetreten. Bitte kontaktieren Sie einen Administrator!
gif_compress_err: GIF konnte nicht komprimiert werden. Befehl abgebrochen!
gif_send_err: GIF überschritt die zulässige Dateigröße! Befehl abgebrochen!
higher_privileges_required: Ich bitte um Entschuldigung, junger Padawan. Höhere Privilegien sind erforderlich. Hier ein Keks :cookie:
higher_privileges_role:
Ich bitte um Entschuldigung, junger Padawan. Höhere Privilegien sind erforderlich. Hier ein Keks :cookie:
Eine dieser Rollen ist erforderlich:
higher_privileges_ranking: Höhere Privilegien sind erforderlich. Sie können diesen Befehl verwenden, wenn Sie Stufe **{}** erreichen mit der Rolle
no_role_id: Bitte geben Sie eine numerische Rollen-ID an!
no_text_channel: Bitte geben Sie eine Textkanalangabe oder eine numerische Textkanal-ID an!
pastebin_paste_err: Eine Pastebin-Seite konnte nicht erstellt werden! Bitte kontaktieren Sie einen Administrator!
pastebin_paste_err_2: Eine Pastebin-Seite konnte nicht erstellt werden! Einen Laufzeitfehler ist aufgetreten!
pastebin_read_err: Bitte geben Sie eine gültige URL einer Pastebin-Seite an!
pastebin_read_err_2: Beim Versuch, aus Pastebin zu lesen, ist ein Fehler aufgetreten! Überprüfen Sie, ob die richtige URL verwendet wurde, und versuchen Sie es dann erneut!
url_invalid: Bitte geben Sie eine gültige Internet-Adresse an!
user_higher_permission: Der Benutzer hat höhere Berechtigungen als der Bot! Aktion abgebrochen!
image_err: Bild nicht gefunden! Bitte versuchen Sie es erneut!
message_watch_err: Geschriebene Nachrichten von **{}** konnten nicht angezeigt werden, weil die Cachelog funktion deaktiviert ist!
exp_limit: Sie haben die Grenze der Erfahrungspunkte erreicht, die Sie heute sammeln können! Morgen können Sie sie wieder sammeln!
level_promotion_failed: Ihre Beförderung auf ein höheres Level ist fehlgeschlagen! Sie fangen wieder von vorne an mit den folgenden Level:
default_skins_err: Ein interner Fehler ist aufgetreten! Standard-Profilbilder sind nicht definiert! Bitte kontaktieren Sie einen Administrator!
level_up_role_err: Sie konnten die neueste freigeschaltete Rolle nicht erhalten, da die folgende Berechtigung erforderlich ist:
rss_no_feed: Es konnte kein RSS-Feed gefunden werden!
watching_lifted: Die Überwachung für den Benutzer **{}** ist aufgrund des folgenden Ereignisses aufgehoben worden:
watching_lifted_err: Ein interner Fehler ist aufgetreten! Der Benutzer **{}** konnte nicht von der Überwachung ausgenommen werden!
about_description: Hier ist alles, was es über mich zu wissen gibt!
about_field_3_desc:
- Große Anzahl von Moderationswerkzeugen wie Chat-Zensierung.
- Rollenmanagement durch Reaktionen.
- Administrative Rechteverwaltung basierend auf Rollen.
- Levelsystem mit selbst gestalteten Profilseiten und Skins.
- Shop für den Kauf von Level-Skins, tägliche Belohnungen und vieles mehr...

 Alle verfügbaren Befehle können mit _{}commands_ eingesehen werden.
about_field_4_desc: Sehen Sie sich die neuesten Aktualisierungen von Azrael auf GitHub an!
command_register:
- **{}register**
Registrieren Sie Kanäle, Rollen und mehr, um verschiedene Moderationsfunktionen zu nutzen.
command_set:
- **{}set**
Verschiedene Bot-Einstellungen für diesen Server aktualisieren, festlegen oder ändern.
command_remove:
- **{}remove**
Entfernen Sie bereits registrierte Textkanäle, Rollen und mehr aus den Bot-Einstellungen.
command_user:
- **{}user**
Mit einem Benutzer interagieren, um Protokolle abzurufen oder administrative Maßnahmen zu ergreifen.
command_filter:
- **{}filter**
Wählen Sie zum Anzeigen, Anhängen oder Entfernen von Wörtern oder Namen aus verschiedenen Filtern oder lustigen Namen.
command_role_reaction:
- **{}roleReaction**
Wählen Sie, ob Sie Rollenreaktionen aktivieren oder deaktivieren möchten.
command_subscribe:
- **{}subscribe**
Abonnieren Sie RSS-Feeds oder Twitter-Hashtags, die in einem Textkanal angezeigt werden können.
command_double_experience:
- **{}doubleexperience**
Aktivieren oder Deaktivieren Sie den Event für doppelte Erfahrungspunkte.
command_heavy_censoring:
- **{}heavycensoring**
Aktivieren Sie diese Funktion im Falle von schweren Spam-Momenten auf einem Server
command_mute:
- **{}mute**
Blockierung eines oder mehrerer Benutzer auf dem Server. Die Angabe eines Grundes ist optional.
command_google:
- **{}google**
Konfigurieren Sie Integrationen nach bestimmten Aktionen mit Diensten von Google.
command_write:
- **{}write**
Lassen Sie den Bot eine Nachricht in einen Kanal Ihrer Wahl schreiben.
command_edit:
- **{}edit**
Bot-Nachrichten bearbeiten oder Reaktionen darauf hinzufügen, mit oder ohne Rollenzuweisungen.
command_pug:
- **{}pug**
Ein Mops-Bild anzeigen. Schreiben Sie *hilfe* um eine Liste aller Parameter zu erhalten.
command_meow:
- **{}meow**
Ein Katzenbild anzeigen. Schreiben Sie *help*, um eine Liste aller Parameter zu erhalten.
command_profile:
- **{}profile**
Anzeige des aktuellen Server-Rangs, des Levels, der Währung und der Erfahrungspunkte.
command_top:
- **{}top**
Eine nach Erfahrungspunkten sortierte Liste der Benutzer anzeigen.
command_use:
- **{}use**
Verwenden Sie einen Gegenstand oder einen Skin aus Ihrem Inventar.
command_shop:
- **{}shop**
Kaufen Sie Gegenstände, Skins und mehr im Shop.
command_quiz:
- **{}quiz**
Starten Sie eine Frage-Antwort-Sitzung mit Belohnungen.
command_randomshop:
- **{}randomshop**
Erhalten Sie Waffen mit gemischten Attributen aus dem Randomshop.
command_equip:
- **{}equip**
Gekaufte Waffen und Fertigkeiten ausrüsten. Zur Verwendung in privaten Nachrichten mit dem Präfix '!'.
command_display:
- **{}display**
Anzeige registrierter Rollen, Kanäle und mehr (einige Parameter können eingeschränkt sein).
command_leave:
- **{}leave**
Leave an already joined matchmaking room.
command_queue:
- **{}queue**
Display all queue members of the joined matchmaking room.
command_cw:
- **{}cw**
Interact with other clans to organize clan wars.
command_room:
- **{}room**
Manage matchmaking rooms and declare winners.
command_stats:
- **{}patchnotes**
Display your current ELO and matchmaking stats.
command_leaderboard:
- **{}leaderboard**
Display top 10 users with most ELO points.
daily_reward: Herzlichen Glückwunsch! Sie haben die folgende Belohnung freigeschaltet:
daily_reward_sent: Der Benutzer **{}** mit der ID-Nummer **{}** hat aus den Daily Befehl eine seltene Belohnung erhalten. Dies ist die Belohnung:
daily_reward_not_sent: Der Benutzer **{}** mit der ID-Nummer **{}** konnte die freigeschaltete Belohnung nicht erhalten, weil Direktnachrichten deaktiviert sind! Dies ist die Belohnung:
daily_error_1: Ein interner Fehler ist aufgetreten! Die erhaltene Belohnung konnte nicht angezeigt werden. Bitte kontaktieren Sie einen Administrator! Sie haben Folgendes erhalten:
daily_error_2: Ein internet Fehler ist aufgetreten! Der Daily Befehl konnte für heute nicht als geöffnet markiert werden. Betroffener Benutzer:
daily_error_3: Ein interner Fehler ist aufgetreten! Ihre tägliche Belohnung konnte nicht in Ihr Inventar aufgenommen werden. Bitte kontaktieren Sie einen Administrator!
daily_empty: Momentan enthält der Daily Befehl keine Belohnungen!
daily_cooldown: Sie haben ihre tägliche Belohnung heute bereits erhalten! Warten Sie **{}** Stunden und **{}** Minuten für die nächste Ziehung!
display_input_not_found: Es wurde nichts für die angeforderte Eingabe gefunden!
display_help: Verwenden Sie einen der verfügbaren Parameter zusammen mit dem Befehl, um weitere Informationen anzuzeigen:
display_help_2:
- **registrierte-rollen**:
Alle registrierten Rollen und ihre Berechtigungsstufe anzeigen.
display_help_3:
- **ranking-rollen**:
Alle mit dem Stufensystem verbundenen Rollen mit ihren Entsperrungsanforderungen anzeigen.
display_help_6:
- **registered-channels**:
Display all registered text channels and their configuration.
display_help_7:
- **tägliche-belohnungen**:
Alle tägliche Belohnungen anzeigen mit ihren Erhaltungwahrscheinlichkeiten.
display_help_9:
- **berechtigungen**:
Für jeden Befehl der 1. und 2. Ebene die Berechtigungsstufe anzeigen.
double_experience_help: Verwenden Sie diesen Befehl, um den aktuellen Modus für Ereignisse mit doppelter Erfahrung zu aktualisieren. Wenn Sie *status* schreiben, wird der aktuelle Modus angezeigt. Diese Modi sind verfügbar:
double_experience_help_1:
- **AUTO**:
Das Doppelte Erfahrung Ereignis beginnt und endet automatisch.
double_experience_help_2:
- **AN**:
Das Doppelte Erfahrung Ereignis ist immer aktiviert.
double_experience_help_3:
- **AUS**:
Das Doppelte Erfahrung Ereignis ist immer deaktiviert.
double_experience_state: Der aktuelle Doppelte Erfahrung Modus ist auf **{}** eingestellt.
double_experience_message:
Das Doppelte Erfahrung Wochenende ist da!
Nutzen Sie diese Chance, mehr Erfahrungspunkte als üblich zu sammeln und um neue Höhen zu erreichen.
Wir sehen uns an der Spitze! Da das Ereignis manuell aktiviert wurde, genießen Sie es, solange es noch andauert!
double_experience_auto:
Das Doppelte Erfahrung Wochenende ist da!
Nutzen Sie diese Chance, mehr Erfahrungspunkte als üblich zu sammeln und um neue Höhen zu erreichen.
Das Ereignis ist von Samstag 00:01 Uhr bis Sonntag 23:59 Uhr MESZ aktiv!
double_experience_error: Der Doppelte Erfahrung Modus ist bereits auf **{}** gesetzt. Aktion unterbrochen!
edit_help:
Aktualisieren Sie jede vom Bot geschriebene Nachricht mit einer Channel-Nennung als ersten Parameter und der ID der Nachricht, die bearbeitet werden muss, als zweiten Parameter!
Schreiben Sie entweder *reaktion-hinzufügen* oder *reaktionen-entfernen* als dritten Parameter, um entweder eine Reaktion hinzuzufügen oder alle Reaktionen zu entfernen! Optional können Benutzer eine Rolle erhalten oder eine Rolle entfernen lassen, indem sie auf die hinzugefügte Reaktion reagieren!
edit_not_bot: Nachrichten anderer Benutzer können nicht bearbeitet werden!
edit_no_text_channel: Textkanal existiert nicht! Bitte versuchen Sie es erneut!
edit_not_enough_params: Bitte geben Sie eine Kanal-ID und eine Nachrichten-ID an!
edit_update: Schicken Sie jetzt bitte Ihre Nachricht ein, um die bestehende Nachricht zu aktualisieren!
edit_not_exists: Nachricht existiert nicht oder ist zu alt!
edit_reaction_add_help: Fügen Sie nun bitte eine Reaktion auf diese Nachricht hinzu, um sie an die gerichtete Nachricht hinzuzufügen!
edit_select_role: Bitte wählen Sie eine Rolle aus, indem Sie eine Nummer eintippen!
edit_no_roles: Es sind keine Rollen verfügbar, die vom Bot zugewiesen werden können! Bitte stellen Sie sicher, dass die Rolle des Bot höher gesetzt wird als die Rollen, die Sie durch eine Reaktion vergeben möchten.
edit_no_number: Bitte geben Sie eine Nummer ein, um eine Rolle auszuwählen!
edit_reactions_clear: Die Reaktionen auf diese Nachricht wurden entfernt!
equip_wrong_channel: Bitte senden Sie *!equip* an {}, um die Befehlsoptionen anzuzeigen!
equip_help:
Schreiben Sie eine der folgenden verfügbaren Optionen, um eine Waffe und/oder Fertigkeit auszurüsten oder abzurüsten. Sie haben 3 Minuten, um eine Option auszuwählen oder schreiben Sie *verlassen*, um zu beenden!

- **anzeigen**:
Derzeit ausgerüsteten Gegenstände anzeigen!
- **setzen**:
Waffe oder Fertigkeit ausrüsten!
- **entfernen**:
Entfernen Sie eine ausgerüstete Waffe oder Fertigkeit!
- **alles-entfernen**:
Entfernen Sie alle derzeit ausgerüsteten Waffen und die eine Fertigkeit!
equip_server_select: Wählen Sie nun bitte einen Server mit der angezeigten Nummer links neben dem Servernamen aus!
equip_server_select_2: Nun schreiben Sie bitte den Servernamen oder die Server-ID, um Waffen und Fertigkeiten für diesen Server auszurüsten!
equip_no_server_found: Keine(n) Server gefunden! Bitte versuchen Sie es erneut!
equip_select_err: Bitte wählen Sie einen Server mit einer der angezeigten Nummern aus!
equip_equipment: Geben Sie eine Zahl von 1 bis 4 ein, um einen Steckplatz auszuwählen und dann eine Waffe oder Fertigkeit auszurüsten! Sobald der Vorgang abgeschlossen ist, schreiben Sie *verlassen*, um das Ausrüsten zu beenden. Für jede Aktion haben Sie 3 Minuten Zeit, bis sie automatisch beendet wird. Aktuelle Ausrüstung:
equip_unequip_all: Alle ausgerüsteten Waffen und Fähigkeiten wurden entfernt!
equip_select_weapon: Geben Sie jetzt den Namen der Waffe ein! Wenn weitere Optionen erscheinen, wählen Sie eine Waffe anhand der Nummer aus!
equip_select_weapon_2: Wählen Sie nun eine Nummer, um die Waffe auszuwählen, die Sie ausrüsten wollen!
equip_select_wep_not_found: Es wurde nichts gefunden. Bitte überprüfen Sie noch einmal, ob Sie diese Waffe in Ihrem Inventar haben und versuchen Sie es erneut oder schreiben Sie *zurück*, um zur Steckplatzauswahl zurückzukehren!
equip_select_skill: Geben Sie nun den Namen der Fertigkeit ein! Wenn weitere Optionen erscheinen, wählen Sie eine mit einer Nummer!
equip_select_skill_2: Wählen Sie nun eine Zahl, um die Fähigkeit auszuwählen, die Sie ausrüsten möchten!
equip_select_skill_not_found: Es wurde nichts gefunden. Bitte überprüfen Sie noch einmal, ob Sie diese Fähigkeit in Ihrem Inventar haben und versuchen Sie es erneut oder schreiben Sie *zurück*, um zur Steckplatzauswahl zurückzukehren!
equip_slot_empty: Sie haben in diesem Steckplatz nichts ausgerüstet!
equip_select_digit: Bitte wählen Sie einen Steckplatz mit den Ziffern 1-4
equip_already_equipped: Sie haben diesen Waffentyp bereits ausgerüstet! Bitte wählen Sie eine andere Waffe oder schreiben Sie *zurück*, um zur Steckplatzauswahl zurückzukehren!
equip_already_equipped_2: Sie haben diese Waffe bereits ausgerüstet! Bitte wählen Sie eine andere Waffe oder schreiben Sie *zurück*, um zur Steckplatzauswahl zurückzukehren!
equip_skill_already_equipped: Diese Fertigkeit haben Sie bereits ausgerüstet! Bitte wählen Sie eine andere Fertigkeit oder schreiben Sie *zurück*, um zur Steckplatzauswahl zurückzukehren!
equip_select_number: Bitte wählen Sie eine der sichtbaren Zahlen aus!
filter_help:
Schreiben Sie einen der folgenden Parameter mit dem Befehl, um an bestimmten Zensurlisten zu arbeiten! Diese Zensurlisten sind verfügbar:

- **wort-zensur**:
Für Wörter, die in einer bestimmten Sprache zu zensieren sind!
- **namen-zensur**:
Für verwendete Wörter in einem Namen, die automatisch umbenannt werden sollen!
- **namen-kick**:
Für verwendete Wörter in einem Namen, die automatisch vom Server gekickt werden!
- **lustige-namen**:
Namen für Benutzer, die automatisch umbenannt wurden!
- **staff-namen**:
Für verwendete Namen, die zum Personal gehören, automatisch umbenennen!
- **verbotene-urls**:
Für URLs, die auf dem Server nicht verwendet werden dürfen!
- **erlaubte-urls**:
Für URL-Ausnahmen, wenn die automatische URL-Löschung aktiviert ist!
- **verbotene-tweets**:
Für Benutzer auf Twitter, um zu verhindern, dass ihre Tweets auf dem Server angezeigt werden!
filter_actions:
Wählen Sie nun die gewünschte Aktion:

**anzeigen
hinzufügen
entfernen
ergänze-pastebin
lade-pastebin**
filter_write_word: Geben Sie jetzt bitte das Wort oder den Namen an!
filter_write_paste: Geben Sie jetzt bitte eine Pastebin-URL an, die alle Wörter oder Namen enthält!
filter_write_fqdn:
Geben Sie jetzt bitte einen voll qualifizierten Domänennamen an. Zum Beispiel: *https://www.google.com*
 Bitte fügen Sie nichts nach der Top-Level-Domain hinzu (z.B. com, de, org)!
filter_write_paste_fqdn:
Geben Sie jetzt bitte eine Pastebin-URL mit vollständig qualifizierten Domänennamen an. Zum Beispiel: *https://www.google.com*
 Bitte fügen Sie nach der Top-Level-Domain (z.B. com, de, org) nichts ein und schreiben Sie einen fqdn pro Zeile!
filter_write_username: Geben Sie jetzt bitte einen Twitter-Benutzernamen an, damit die Tweets nicht mehr in Discord gepostet werden können!
filter_write_paste_username: Geben Sie jetzt bitte eine Pastebin-URL mit Twitter-Benutzernamen an, damit die Tweets nicht mehr in Discord gepostet werden können!
filter_write_insert: Das Wort oder der Name wurde erfolgreich hinzugefügt!
filter_write_remove: Das Wort oder der Name wurde erfolgreich entfernt!
filter_write_add_pastebin: Die Wörter oder Namen wurden erfolgreich hinzugefügt!
filter_duplicates: Duplikate gefunden! Bitte entfernen Sie alle Duplikate und versuchen Sie es dann erneut! Gefundene Duplikate:
filter_rollback_err: Ein kritischer Fehler ist aufgetreten! Der Inhalt für die ausgewählte Liste wurde geändert, aber die Änderungen konnten aufgrund eines Fehlers nicht rückgängig gemacht werden!
filter_no_url: Bitte reichen Sie eine Pastebin-URL ein!
filter_no_nick: Bitte reichen Sie eine Pastebin-URL mit Benutzernamen ein, die mit *@* beginnen!
filter_invalid_char: Es wurde ein ungültiges Zeichen verwendet! Bitte entfernen Sie es und versuchen Sie es dann erneut!
google_help:
Kombinieren Sie verfügbare Bot-Ereignisse mit Google APIs und erstellen Sie eine Schnittstelle für den Datenexport, jedes Mal, wenn ein bestimmtes Ereignis ausgelöst wurde! In einigen Fällen sind Schreib- und Bearbeitungsberechtigungen für diese E-Mail erforderlich *{}*. Zum Beispiel, wenn private Dokumente bearbeitet werden müssen!
 Diese APIs sind derzeit als Parameter verfügbar:

- **dokumente**:
Schnittstelle mit google docs.
- **spreadsheets**:
Schnittstelle google spreadsheets.
- **drive**:
Schnittstelle mit google drive.
google_api_not_available: API existiert nicht, ist nicht verfügbar oder wurde falsch geschrieben! Bitte versuchen Sie es erneut!
google_webservice: Der Google-Webservice hat mit folgendem geantwortet:
google_no_events: Es wurden keine Ereignisse konfiguriert! Bitte kontaktieren Sie einen Administrator!
google_not_linked_event: Es gibt kein Ereignis, das mit dieser Tabelle verknüpft ist! Bitte verknüpfen Sie es mit einem oder mehreren Ereignissen, bevor Sie fortfahren!
google_invalid_dds: Die folgenden Data-Dictionary-Einträge sind ungültig. Bitte reichen Sie Ihre Einträge erneut ein:
google_sheet_help:
Benutzen Sie einen der untenstehenden Parameter, um durch das Tabellen-Setup zu navigieren oder geben Sie *verlassen* ein, um das Setup jederzeit zu schließen! Diese Meldung wird nur einmal angezeigt:

- **erstellen**:
Erstellen Sie eine Google Tabelle!
- **ergänze**:
Ergänzen Sie eine bereits existierende Google Tabelle!
- **entfernen**:
Entfernen Sie eine verknüpfte Google Tabelle (kein Löschen)!
- **ereignisse**:
Ordnen Sie Ereignisse zu bestehende Google Tabellen!
- **tabellenblatt**:
Definieren Sie das Tabellenblatt und die Zeile/Spalte, auf denen gearbeitet werden soll!
- **mappen**:
Mappen Sie die verfügbaren Tabellenfelder mit Werten aus dem Bot!

Registrierte Google Tabellen:
google_sheet_create: Use this parameter together with a title name to create a new spreadsheet and directly link it with the Bot! Note that for this action, a valid google email address needs to be provided in the Bot settings!
google_sheet_created:
Google Spreadsheet has been created and linked to the Bot!
URL: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/
google_sheet_created_2:
Google Spreadsheet has been created but couldn't be linked with the Bot! Try to link the created spreadsheet with the following url and add parameter:
URL: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/
google_sheet_email: Please configure a google email address before using this command, so that the ownership can be moved to that email address!
google_sheet_add_help: Use this parameter together with a spreadsheet URL or just the file ID to link it with the Bot!
google_sheet_added: The google spreadsheet has been linked with the Bot!
google_sheet_url: Please provide a google spreadsheet URL or file ID which the Bot can access!
google_sheet_remove_help: Use this parameter together with a spreadsheet URL or just the file ID to remove the link with the Bot!
google_sheet_removed: Link with the Bot has been severed!
google_sheet_event_help: The following spreadsheets are linked! Please select a spreadsheet that you wish to add or remove events from:
google_sheet_no_file: No linked file has been found. Please link or create a google spreadsheet before using this command!
google_sheet_events_add:
Now type in the required events starting with either *add* or *remove*. If multiple events should be inserted, separate them with a ','.
These are the supported events for spreadsheets:
google_sheet_not_event: The provided event **{}** either doesn't exist or is not supported for spreadsheets!
google_sheet_events_added: Event(s) have been linked with the file! Don't forget to map the columns and to define the starting point!
google_sheet_events_removed: Event(s) have been removed from the file!
google_sheet_start_help: The following spreadsheets are linked! Please select a spreadsheet to edit the starting point through the shown number:
google_sheet_event_select: Now please select an event by typing the name of the event! These are the events that can be chosen:
google_sheet_start_set: Now please submit the starting point by writing it together with the name of the sheet (e.g. 'Sheet1!A1')!
google_sheet_start_updated: The starting point has been saved for this spreadsheet and event!
google_sheet_map_help: The following spreadsheets are linked! Please select a spreadsheet to map the columns with a data dictionary item through the shown number:
google_sheet_map_add:
Now please submit a list of data items, divided by a comma in the exact order that it has to write into the spreadsheet sheet! Few data dictionary items can be additionally formated by separating item and format by '+'.
Example input: 'timestamp+dd-MM-yyyy,user_id,nickname+UPPER_CASE,name'.

These are the available data dictionary items for this event:
google_sheet_no_dd: No available data dictionary items have been found for this event and spreadsheet!
google_sheet_dd_added: Data dictionary items have been registered for this event and spreadsheet!
google_sheet_no_mapping: No column mapping has been found!
google_sheet_no_start_point: No Spreadsheet starting point could be found for this event!
google_sheet_not_inserted: Row couldn't be inserted into the Spreadsheet!
heavy_censoring_help:
Add either *enable* or *disable* to the command to operate this functionality! If Heavy Censoring is enabled and a text channel is censoring at least one language, the following messages will be removed:
- *Messages which contain only one letter*.
- *Messages which contain screenshots*.
- *Messages which are repeated multiple times*.
- *Messages which don't contain any normal letter or digits (e.g. unicodes)*.

If this functionality removes a large number of messages and the threshold of 30 has been reached, it will warn users with a mute after removing a message! The counter for the threshold increases for *every removed message* and *decreases automatically by 1* after every minute. Use the *reset* parameter to manually reset this counter to 0!
heavy_censoring_reset_err: Heavy Censoring has to be enabled before the threshold counter can be resetted! Note that the threshold counter starts with 0 every time this functionality gets enabled!
heavy_censoring_soft: Heavy Censoring has stopped to mute users after removing a message now, because the threshold counter is again lower than 30!
heavy_censoring_hard: Heavy Censoring has now started to mute users after removing a message now, because the threshold counter is 30 or higher!
heavy_censoring_reason: Heavy Censoring mute after reaching the limit!
mute_help: Write this command together with multiple user IDs or user names with discriminators to mute multiple users at the same time. Optionally, a reason for the mute can be applied after listing all users as parameter!
mute_name_not_exists: The user **{}** doesn't exist on this server!
mute_id_not_exists: The user with the id number **{}** doesn't exist on this server!
mute_err: Please provide one or more existing usernames or user IDs and then a reason if desired!
patchnotes_help: Please write one of the following titles as last parameter to display the patch notes.
patchnotes_choice_1: Please choose between *public* and *private* patch notes!
patchnotes_choice_2: Please choose between *public*, *private* and *game* patch notes!
patchnotes_choice_3: Please choose between *bot* and *game* patch notes!
profile_no_icons: _No default level skin provided to upload the profile page image!_
profile_err: An internal error occurred! Profile couldn't be displayed! Please contact an administrator!
rank_no_icons: _No default level skin provided to upload the rank page image!_
rank_err: An internal error occurred! Rank page couldn't be displayed! Please contact an administrator!
level_message: Congratulations for the level up! New level **{}**
level_err: An internal error occurred! Level Up message couldn't be displayed! Please contact an administrator!
quiz_help:
Have the best Discord Quiz experience by registering questions! The following parameters are available.

- **register-rewards**:
Register a list of rewards.
- **register-questions**:
Register questions, answers and hints.
- **clear**:
Clear all registered questions and rewards.
- **run**:
Launch the Quiz.
quiz_rewards_help: Submit a public pastebin link which contains a list of rewards. Please insert only one reward for each line!
quiz_questions_help:
Submit a public pastebin link which contains a list of questions, answers and optionally also hints. Here is an example of how the list should look like:
```
START
1. Guess my hair color.
:black
;It's a typical color for south orientals.
END
START
What is the color of a watermelon?
:green
:red
END
```
*'START'*: Expects a question in the next line which starts with a number (e.g. *1.*).
*':'*: The answer to the question. Up to 3 answers for every question allowed.
*';'*: Hint message for unanswered questions after 20 seconds.
*'='*: Optional reward, if not already registered.
*'END'*: Signals the end of the first question.
quiz_clear: Questions and rewards have been cleared!
quiz_no_q_and_a: Please register questions and answers before launching the Quiz!
quiz_no_rewards: Please register rewards before launching the Quiz!
quiz_run_help:
Please select one of the available modes to start the Quiz:
*1*: no restrictions
*2*: users have to wait 3 questions after submitting the right answer.
*3*: Every participant can win only once.
quiz_no_qa_rewards: Please register questions, answers and rewards before launching the Quiz!
quiz_rewards_registered: All rewards have been registered successfully!
quiz_only_rewards: Please don't try to register questions with this parameter! Please register only rewards!
quiz_questions_registered: All questions have been registered successfully!
quiz_no_settings: No quiz settings found to load!
quiz_start_shortly: The Quiz will start shortly in <#{}>
quiz_err_1: Question {}: Question was skipped and hence missing! Please check if the *START* and *END* parameter are properly set!
quiz_err_3: Question {}: Has at least one answer but no question!
quiz_err_4: Question {}: Has at least one hint but no question!
quiz_err_5: Question {}: Reward has been inserted but the question is missing!
quiz_reply_1: I didn't see any correct answers yet. See you again in 20 seconds!
quiz_reply_2: Retry again! No one got it right yet!
quiz_reply_3: Sadly no hints are available... Keep on trying!
quiz_starting: Hello everyone! The quit is about to begin. Get ready!
quiz_first_question: Now it's time for the first question! Check it out!
quiz_winner_notification: The user **{}** with the ID number **{}** has received the following quiz reward:
quiz_winner_notification_2: The user **{}** with the ID number **{}** has won a quiz reward but his private messages are closed. This is the reward that this user should have received:
quiz_reward_send_err: User didn't receive the following quiz reward!
quiz_question_skip: Question skipped! Here is the next question!
quiz_interrupted: The quiz has been interrupted! Thank you all for participating and see you next time!
quiz_hint_1: No right answer has been given! Here a hint:
quiz_hint_2: Sadly still no answer has been found... Here another hint:
quiz_hint_3: We are getting desperate here! This is the last available hint:
quiz_end: Sadly I have no more questions left and I hate to end the fun like this... Thank you all for participating and see you next time!
randomshop_replay_err: PLease retype the full command, since you didn't play Randomshop these last 10 minutes
register_help_1: Use this command to register either a channel, a role, a ranking role or all users in a guild. For the first time, an administrator role needs to be registered and afterwards all the other features for this command will be unlocked. Write the role parameter together with the command!
register_help_2:
Use this command to register either a channel, a role, a ranking role or all users in a guild. Use the following parameters together with the command to get more details:

- **role**:
Register a role.
- **text-channel**:
Register a text channel.
- **text-channel-url**:
Enable or Disable url censoring for a text channel.
- **text-channel-txt**:
Enable or Disable text removal in a text channel.
- **text-channels**:
Register all text channels.
- **ranking-role**:
Register a ranking role to unlock after leveling up.
- **users**:
Register all users on the server.
register_channel_help: Register text channels so that the Bot can use most of his functionalities! To register text channels, write the channel type as second parameter and mention a text channel as third parameter together with the command! These are the available channel types:
register_channel_no_types: No channel types have been found!
register_channel_url_help: Write a text channel mention as second parameter and either *enable* or *disable* as third parameter to change the url censoring options for one text-channel! By default, the url censoring is disabled on all text channels!
register_channel_txt_help: Write a text channel mention as second parameter and either *enable* or *disable* as third parameter to change the text removal options for one text-channel! By default, the text removal is disabled on all text channels!
register_all_channels: All text channels have been registered!
register_rank_role_help: Write the role ID as second parameter and the required level to unlock the role as third parameter to register a ranking role! A user will automatically receive the unlocked role once reaching that level.
register_rank_role_no_level: Please type a level between 1 and 9999!
register_rank_role_added: The role **{}** will be unlocked after reaching level **{}**
register_role_help: Write the role type as second parameter and the role ID as third parameter to register a role! These role types are available:
register_role_no_types: No role types have been found!
register_role_invalid_param: Passed parameter doesn't exist or *adm* for the first role hasn't been used!
register_role_adm_added: The primary administrator role has been registered!
remove_help:
Remove a registered option! Write one of the following parameters together with the command for more details:

- **role**:
Remove a registered role.
- **ranking-role**:
Remove a registered ranking role.
- **text-channel**:
Remove a registered text channel.
- **channel-censor**:
Remove censoring languages from a text channel.
remove_role_help: Insert a role ID together with the full command to remove a registered role or type *all* to remove all registerd roles!
remove_ranking_help: Insert a role ID together with the full command to remove a registered ranking role or type *all* to remove all registerd ranking roles!
remove_txt_channel_help: Mention a text channel together with the full command to remove a registered text channel or type *all* to remove all registerd text channels!
remove_censor_help: Mention a text channel together with the full command to remove all registered censor languages from this text channel or type *all* to remove all registered censor languages from all text channels!
remove_roles: All registered roles have been removed!
remove_roles_err: There are no registered roles! Action interrupted!
remove_role_err: This role has not been registered! Action interrupted!
remove_ranking_roles: All registered ranking roles have been removed!
remove_ranking_roles_err: There are no registered ranking roles! Action interrupted!
remove_ranking_role: Ranking role has been successfully removed!
remove_ranking_role_err: This role has not been registered as a ranking role! Action interrupted!
remove_txt_channels: All registered text channels have been removed!
remove_txt_channels_err: There are no registered text channels! Action interrupted!
remove_txt_channel: Text channel has been successfully removed!
remove_txt_channel_err: This text channel has not been registered! Action interrupted!
remove_censors: All registered censor languages from all text channels have been removed!
remove_censors_err: There is no registered censor language for any text channel! Action interrupted!
remove_censor: All registered text channel filters for this text channel have been removed!
remove_censor_err: No censor language has been registered for this text channel!
role_reaction_help: Write *enable* or *disable* together with the the command to operate the Bot's reaction functionality. By disabling, all not perisistent reaction roles will be removed from all users!
role_reaction_disable: Role reactions have been disabled and all not persistent reaction roles have been removed from all users!
role_reaction_print: Assign yourself a unique role! React to one of the reactions below to receive your role! To have the role removed, simply react again! Here a listing with all available reactions and roles:
set_help:
Update options and functionalities by setting values! These parameters are available:

- **permission-level**:
Update the permission level of a role.
- **channel-censor**:
Set one or more censor languages for one text channel.
- **warnings**:
Define the maximum number of warnings that a user can have before receiving a ban or permanent mute and set a mute time for every warning.
- **ranking**:
Enable and disable the level system.
- **max-experience**:
Define a daily limit of obtainable experience points or enable and disable this functionality.
- **default-level-skin**:
Define a default level up skin.
- **default-rank-skin**:
Define a default rank skin.
- **default-profile-skin**:
Define a default profile skin.
- **default-icon-skin**:
Define default icon skin which the level, rank and profile skins can utilize.
- **daily-item**:
Define items which can be obtained from the daily items.
- **giveaway-items**:
Add giveaway rewards for the daily command.
- **comp-server**:
Define servers for the competitive scene.
- **max-clan-members**
Set a limit for how many members are allowed to be in a clan.
- **matchmaking-members**:
Set a limit for how many members can join a matchmaking room.
- **map**:
Add maps which can be used for competitive commands.
set_permission: Change the permission level of a role between 0 (lowest) to 100 (highest)! Write a numerical role ID as second parameter and the numerical permission level as third parameter!
set_permission_added: The permission level has been updated successfully for this role!
set_permission_no_level: Please provide a numerical permission level between 0 and 100 as third parameter!
set_censor: Set one or few self chosen censor languages on a text channel! Mention a text channel or write the channel ID as second parameter and the censor language abbreviations as third parameter. If multiple languages are required, divide the language abbreviations with a comma. These are all the available languages:
set_censor_valid_lang: Please provide at least one supported language!
set_censor_err: Censoring language **{}** couldn't be saved for the provided text channel!
set_censor_added: Censoring languages have been saved for the provided text channel!
set_ranking: Write *enable* or *disable* as second parameter to either enable or disable the level system!
set_max_experience: Write a numerical value as second parameter to set a daily experience limit! If an experience limit is already set, use either *enable* or *disable* as second parameter to turn it on and off.
set_max_experience_enabled: The daily max experience points limitation has been enabled!
set_max_experience_disabled: The daily max experience points limitation has been disabled!
set_max_experience_added: The daily max experience points limitation has been enabled and set to
set_available_skins: Please write a number to select one of the available skins!
set_level_help: Write one of the available skin number as second parameter to select the default level skin. These level up skins are available:
set_level_update: The default level skin has been updated to
set_rank_help: Write one of the available skin number as second parameter to select the default rank skin. These rank skins are available:
set_rank_update: The default rank skin has been updated to
set_profile_help: Write one of the available skin number as second parameter to select the default profile skin. These profile skins are available:
set_profile_update: The default profile skin has been updated to
set_icon_help: Write one of the available skin number as second parameter to select the default icons skin. These icon skins are available:
set_icon_update: The default icon skin has been updated to
set_invalid_number: Please write one of the available skin numbers as second parameter!
set_level_skin_err: Level skins are not available with the current theme!
set_rank_skin_err: Rank skins are not available with the current theme!
set_profile_skin_err: Profile skins are not available with the current theme!
set_icon_skin_err: Icon skins are not available with the current theme!
set_daily_item_help:
Write the type of item as second parameter, the probability as third parameter and the item name as last parameter! Here two examples on how the probability parameter should look like:

*0,01% = 1*
*25,00% = 25000*

These item types are available:

*cur*: Currency
*exp*: Experience boosters
*cod*: Giveaway rewards
set_daily_invalid_type: Please use an existing daily type!
set_daily_already_registered: This daily item has been already registered!
set_daily_over_the_limit: The provided probability exceeds the 100% limit. Current total probability: **{}**
set_daily_added: Daily item has been registered! Current total probability: **{}**
set_giveaway: Please past a pastebin link which contains all giveaway rewards for the current month
set_warning_help:
Define the maximal amount of warnings that a user can receive before a ban! Write a number between 1-5 as second parameter to start the setup.

Note that this setting will override all previous user warnings, if the current warning of a user is higher than the one being set!
set_warning_not_valid: Please provide the number of warnings between 1-5 for the second parameter!
set_warning_1:
The system has been set to warn **{}** time(s) before a ban occurs! To complete the setup, you'll be asked to enter the time in minutes for every single warning. Reply within 3 minutes for every warning.

Please insert the time in minutes for warning 1!
set_warning_2:
The warning timer **{}** has been updated!
Now, please insert the time in minutes for warning {}!
set_warning_added: The warnings have been configured successfully!
set_ranking_enable: The Level system has been enabled!
set_ranking_disable: The Level system has been disabled!
set_comp_server_help:
Write either *add* or *remove* as second parameter and then the server name together with the command, to either add or remove a server for the competitive scene!
Note that providing servers is optional and is not required in order to use other commands for the competitive scene.
set_comp_server_readded: The server **{}** has been already added!
set_comp_server_not_exists: Server {} doesn't exist or has been already removed!
set_max_clan_members_help: Write a number between 0 and 1000 to set the max amount of clan members on the server!
set_max_clan_members_err: Please write a number between 0 and 1000!
set_max_clan_members_updated: Max allowed clan members number updated!
set_matchmaking_members_help: Write a number between 0 and 100 to set the max allowed members that can join a matchmaking room!
set_matchmaking_members_err: Please write a number between 0 and 100!
set_matchmaking_members_suc: Matchmaking rooms are now limited to **{}** members for each room!
set_maps_help: Register optional maps which can be used with competitive commands! Write the name of the map as second parameter and if available, an image url as third parameter.
set_maps_err: If you're setting an image url for the map, please be sure that the provided url is valid!
set_maps_success: Map has been successfully added or updated!
shop_help:
Welcome to my shop! Have a look around! Write out the section that you wish to take a closer look into and type *exit* when you wish to leave!

*LEVEL UPS*:
View and purchase level up skins!
*RANKS*:
View and purchase rank skins!
*PROFILES*:
View and purchase profile skins!
*ICONS*:
View and purchase icon skins which are shown on ranks and profile skins!
*ITEMS*:
View and purchase items such as experience boosters!
*WEAPONS*:
View and purchase weapons to fill your arsenal!
*SKILLS*:
View and purchase skills!
shop_not_enough_cur: You don't have enough money for this purchase!
shop_show: ***Here the requested stock! Write a number to inspect!***
shop_inspect_err: Please write one of the visible numbers for further inspection!
shop_display_wep: You're interested in my weaponry? Alright! Choose one of these categories:
shop_title_exit: Thanks for the visit! See you again!
subscribe_help:
Use this command to subscribe RSS pages or Twitter hashtags that will be displayed into a dedicated channel! These are all the available parameters:

- **register**:
Subscribe a RSS Feed or a Twitter Hashtag!
- **format**:
Define the display options for your RSS Feeds and Twitter Hashtags!
- **options**:
Define additional options for Twitter Hashtags!
- **remove**:
Remove a registered RSS feed or Twitter Hashtag!
- **test**:
Test a registered RSS Feed or Twitter Hashtag!
- **display**:
Show a list of registered RSS Feeds and Twitter Hashtags!
subscribe_register_help:
Do you wish to add a RSS Feed or a Twitter Hashtag?
Write either 1 to register a RSS Feed or 2 to register a Twitter Hashtag as second parameter!
subscribe_register_rss: Now please apply a RSS URL!
subscribe_register_hashtag: Now please apply a Twitter Hashtag!
subscribe_login_twitter: It was not possible to connect to Twitter! Please contact an administrator!
subscribe_register_err: Please write either 1 or 2 as possible parameter to register a RSS Feed or a Twitter Hashtag!
subscribe_no_subscriptions: <No registered RSS Feeds or Twitter Hashtags found>
subscribe_remove_help: Remove a registered RSS Feed or Twitter Hashtag by selecting it with a number which is displayed below:
subscribe_format_help: Format a registered RSS Feed or Twitter Hashtag by selecting it with a number which is displayed below:
subscribe_options_help: Further format a Twitter Hashtag by selecting it with a number which is displayed below:
subscribe_test_help: Test a registered RSS Feed or Twitter Hashtag by selecting it with a number which is displayed below:
subscribe_display_help: Here a list with all registered RSS Feeds and Twitter Hashtags:
subscribe_already_done: Subscribing not possible because it has been already subscribed!
subscribe_displayed_num: Please write one of the displayed numbers!
subscribe_format_rss:
This is the current format for this Feed. Type your desired format for this feed or type *exit* to interrupt. Key values are `{pubDate}`, `{title}`, `{description}`, `{link}`
```
subscribe_format_hash:
This is the current format for this Hashtag. Type your desired format for displayed tweets or type *exit* to interrupt. Key values are `{pubDate}`, `{fullName}`, `{username}`, `{description}`
```
subscribe_format_updated: The display format has been updated!
subscribe_options_6:
Type *enable/disable pictures/videos/text* to either enable or disable one of these options!
Also, type *add-child/remove-child #<hashtag>* to combine a hashtag with another hashtag or to remove the binding.
Once complete, type *exit* to complete the set up.
subscribe_option_bound: Child Hashtag is already bound to
subscribe_option_not_bound: Child Hashtag is already not bound to
top_title: #Here the top 10 of the current page! Write a page number together with the command to switch pages!
use_help:
Write the name of the item or skin together with the command to either use an item or to use an obtained skin!
If you wish to reset your skin choice write either *default-level*, *default-rank*, *default-profile* or *default-icons* as first parameter!
use_skin: **{}** will be used from now on!
use_not_exists: This item or skin doesn't exist in your inventory!
user_help: To display information or to take administrative actions against a user, mention the user or write the user's user ID as parameter!
user_found_1: User **{}** has been found! Now type one of the following words within 3 minutes to process an action! In case you want to abort the current action, type *exit*.
user_found_6: **unmute** Unmute a user by stopping the timer.
user_found_13: **watch**: Log all messages or only deleted messages.
user_not_found: User not found! Please try again!
user_number: Please write one of the displayed numbers!
user_reason_question: Do you wish to provide a reason?
user_info_names_err: Names couldn't be displayed because it exceeded the limit of characters! Upload on Pastebin failed!
user_info_nicknames_err: Nicknames couldn't be displayed because it exceeded the limit of characters! Upload on Pastebin failed!
user_info_err: Information page couldn't be displayed! The user has to rejoin the server!
user_delete_help: Please choose how many messages have to be removed from 1-100!
user_delete_question: Do you wish to delete messages?
user_delete_nothing: Nothing has been found to delete...
user_delete_nothing_2:
Nothing has been found to delete...
Please enable the cachelog!
user_warning_help: Please provide a numerical warning value that is lower or equal to the highest possible warning!
user_warning_clear: The warnings of this user have been cleared!
user_warning_updated: The warning value has been updated for this user!
user_warning_updated_limit: The highest possible warning value has been set for this user!
user_warning_never_warned: The warning value couldn't be updated because this user wasn't warned in the past or has been unbanned!
user_warning_is_muted: The warning value couldn't be updated because this user is currently muted or banned!
user_mute_already_muted: This user is already muted! Please use *unmute* before reapplying the mute again!
user_mute_choice: Do you wish to provide a self chosen mute timer? By providing a self chosen mute timer, the warning value won't increment unless the user has never been warned before!
user_mute_format:
Please provide a mute time in the following format:

To set the time in minutes: eg. *1m*.
To set the time in hours: eg.*1h*.
To set the time in days: eg. *1d*.
user_mute_left: Action cannot be executed. Do you wish to apply the mute role after the user has rejoined the server?
user_mute_order_2: Permanent mute order has been issued!
user_mute_numeric: Please type a numerical value together with a time unit m, h or d!
user_unmute_run: Action issued to interrupt the mute! Please note that warnings don't get reverted while applying a custom mute time!
user_unmute_run_2: Action issued to interrupt the mute! Reverting the applied warning!
user_unmute_not_muted: This user is not muted! Please apply this action to unmute a muted user!
user_unmute_infinite: The user **{}** with the ID number **{}** has been unmuted and is no longer permanently muted!
user_unmute_is_banned: This user is banned! Unmute action aborted!

Now please select a log level.
1: Log only deleted messages from this user
2: log all written messages from a user!

user_unwatch: This user is not being watched anymore!
user_unwatch_not_watched: This user is not being watched! No actions required!
user_gift_exp: Choose a number of experience points to add to the total number of experience points!
user_set_exp: Choose a number of experience points to set to the user
user_level: Specify the level that this user should receive!
user_level_err: Please choose a level that is lower or equal to
user_gift_cur: Choose an amount of money to gift the user!

user_set_cur: Choose an amount of money that this user should have!

write_help:
Write a message into another text channel which then can be updated with the *edit* command!
Mention the text channel or write out the channel ID as first parameter to begin!
write_too_long: Message can't be longer than 2000 letters!
randomshop_help: Write either one weapon type or weapon category as second parameter to open the random shop! By writing *play* as second parameter and the weapon type or weapon category as third parameter, then a randomshop round will start with a weapon to win! Instead if *replay* is used as second parameter, then another round will start with the previously selected weapon type or weapon category!

name_staff_2:

name_staff_err_2: **{}** changed the name and is impersonating a staff member but no nickname could be assigned. The following permission is required:

name_assign_2: **{}** with the ID number **{}** changed the name into **{}**. Hence the following nickname has been assigned to this user: **{}**
name_assign_err: **{}** joined this server with a not allowed name! No nickname could be assigned because the following permission is required:
name_assign_err_2: **{}** with the ID number **{}** changed the name into **{}** but no nickname could be assigned. The following permission is required:

name_kick_title: User kicked for having a not allowed name!

name_kick_reason: Kicked because the user had the word {} inside the name!
name_kick_permission_err: **{}** with the ID number **{}** joined the server with a not allowed name that contained the word **{}** but couldn't be kicked because the following permission is required:
name_kick_permission_err_2: **{}** with the ID number **{}** changed the name into **{}** which contained the not allowed word **{}** but couldn't be kicked because the following permission is required:
edit_watch_err: The edited message from **{}** couldn't be displayed because the Cachelog is disabled!
reaction_added: The reaction has been added! Do you want to combine it with a role?
reaction_no_permission: Reaction role couldn't be applied for user **{}** with the ID number **{}** because the following permission is required:
delete_permission_err: Deleted message detected! More details couldn't be displayed because the following permission is required:
delete_rank_role_err: Registered ranking role couldn't be removed! Please contact an administrator!
role_roles_remove_err: permission required to remove all roles!
role_again_muted_1: **{}** with the ID number **{}** got the mute role reassigned and is again permanently muted. The mute role has been reassigned manually!
role_again_muted_2: **{}** with the ID number **{}** got the mute role reassigned before the mute timer elapsed. Mute role has been reassigned manually!
role_again_muted_3: **{}** with the ID number **{}** got the mute role reassigned and is again permanently muted. Mute role has been reassigned after this user has rejoined the server!
role_again_muted_4: **{}** with the ID number **{}** got the mute role reassigned before the mute timer elapsed. Mute role has been reassigned after this user has rejoined the server!
role_mute_dm: You have been muted from **{}**. The mute will last for **{}**. Please refrain from rejoining the server, since the mute role will be reapplied again! This is an automated reply. You'll receive no reply by writing in direct message!
role_mute_dm_2: You have been muted from **{}**. The mute will last for **{}** (Warning {}). Please refrain from rejoining the server, since the mute role will be reapplied again! This is an automated reply. You'll receive no reply by writing in direct message!
role_mute_dm_3: You have been muted permanently from **{}**. Thank you for your understanding! Please refrain from the rejoining the server, since the mute role will be reapplied again! This is an automated reply. You'll receive no reply by writing in direct message!
role_ban_dm: You have been banned from **{}**, since you have exceeded the maximal amount of allowed warnings. Thank you for your understanding. This is an automated reply. You'll receive no reply by writing in direct message!
role_dm_locked: User couldn't be warned regarding the mute because the user's direct messages is locked!
role_ban_dm_locked: User couldn't be warned regarding the ban because the user's direct messages is locked!
role_ban_reason: User got banned after reaching the limit of mutes!
role_ban_permission_err: The user **{}** with the ID number **{}** couldn't be banned after reaching the limit of allowed mutes because the following permission is missing:
role_mute_removed: The mute role has been set on a user with higher privileges! Role removed!
role_mute_remove_err: The mute role couldn't be retracted because the following permission is missing:
role_flag_remove: An internal error occurred! The mute flag couldn't be removed!
role_reassign_err: Ranking roles can't be assigned because the following permission is required:
role_manual_remove_title: Mute role has been manually removed!
role_manually_removed: **{}** has manually removed the mute role from **{}** who has the ID number **{}**
role_manually_remove_perm: **The user who removed the role couldn't be retrieved because the following permission is missing:**
role_remove_elapsed_reason: The mute role has been removed after the timer has ended!
unban_info_err: **The user who unbaned this user couldn't be retrieved because the following permission is missing: **

**{}** with the ID number **{}** has been unbanned!
Unbanned by: **{}**
Reason:
unban_flag_err: An internal error occurred! The ban flag couldn't be removed! Please contact an administrator!
meow_help: Write one of these parameters together with the command to display a car picture!
pug_help: Write one of these parameters together with the command to display a pug picture:
pug_help_2: Pug emojis dressed as food and drinks:
pug_help_3: Pug emojis dressed as marvel characters:
unmute_message: **{}** with the ID number **{}** has been unmuted!
unmute_message_2: **{}** with the ID number **{}** has been unmuted and the timer has been interrupted!
unmute_recount_title: Warned users can't run away even after a reboot!
unmute_recount: users were found muted on start up. The mute timers restarted, from where it stopped!
unmute_recount_excluded: Excluded are users that are permanently muted on this server!
unmute_remove_err: The mute role couldn't be removed because the following permission is required:
unmute_limbo: users were stuck in a mute limbo and have been unmuted!
join_no_profile: Before this command can be used, you'll have to create a profile page. Complete your profile page by submitting a *name* to represent yourself.
join_no_profile_2: Before this command can be used, you'll have to create a profile page. Start by submitting a *name* to represent yourself, and after that submit the name of the server you're mainly playing in.
join_profile_created: Welcome **{}**! You're now able to create matchmaking rooms and join already created matchmaking rooms!
join_profile_created_2: Welcome **{}**! To complete the setup, please provide the name of the server you primarily play in. These servers are available:
join_no_server: Please select one of the above available servers!
join_server_added: Setup complete! You can now reuse the command!
join_server_missing: Please select your primary server out of the list of servers below before you use this command! This message appears because you either didn't select a server your profile setup or because the server settings have been changed.
join_name_taken: This name is already taken! Please choose a different name.
join_help: To join the queue of an existing matchmaking room, write either *normal* to join regular matchmaking rooms or write *picking* to join a group based matchmaking room together with the command!
join_err_10: There's no open matchmaking room to join!
join_err_11: You have already joined the queue of a different room!
join_err_12: The current max matchmaking room size is at 0 members per room. Please contact an administrator!
join_queue: {} has joined the queue of room {}. ({}/{})
clan_memberless:
You're currently not part of any clan! The following parameters are available to either search a clan, apply to a clan or to create a clan: 

**search** <optional with clan name>.
**apply** <clan name>
**create** <clan name>
clan_member: Clan page! These parameters are available: **search**, **members**, **leave**
clan_staff: Clan page! These parameters are available: **search**, **members**, **leave**, **kick**, **invite**
clan_owner: Clan page! These parameters are available: **search**, **members**, **kick**, **invite**, **delegate**, **icon**, **promote**, **disband**
clan_no_clans: No clan has been created yet!
clan_search_err: No clan found with the provided filter!
clan_apply_err: Please write a clan name to apply!
clan_apply_not_found: Clan to apply doesn't exist! Please try again.
clan_apply_no_manager: This clan is without any staff member! Please contact an administrator!
clan_apply_direct_message: The user {} which has the username **{}**, wishes to join the clan! React to this message to take a decision. Note that all members with staff rights have received the same message.
clan_apply_already_submitted: Application has been already submitted to this clan!
clan_accepted: This user has been already accepted into the clan!
clan_accepted_2: User has been accepted into the clan!
clan_accepted_3: You have successfully accepted the invitation and joined the clan!
clan_denied: This user has been already denied from joining the clan!
clan_denied_2: User has not been allowed to join the clan!
clan_denied_3: You have chosen to not join the clan!
clan_limit: The clan has reached the limit of max allowed members! More users can't be accepted!
clan_dm_accepted: Your application to the clan has been accepted!
clan_dm_denied: Your application to the clan has not been accepted!
clan_leave_err: Please write the exact name of the clan together with the parameter to leave the clan!
clan_leave_err_2: The clan name is not correct! Please try again!
clan_leave_left: You have successfully left the clan!
clan_invalid_name: Please provide a member mention or a username!
clan_user_not_found: The provided user couldn't be found!
clan_user_not_in_same_clan: This user is not part of this clan!
clan_not_on_yourself: You cannot use this operation on yourself!
clan_not_allowed: This operation is not allowed on this chosen user!
clan_already_in_clan: This user is already in a clan!
clan_kicked: User {} has been kicked from the clan!
clan_kick_dm: You have been kicked from clan {}!
clan_invite_err: This user couldn't be invited because this user is not present on the server!
clan_invite_dm: You have been invited to join the guild {}! Do you accept?
clan_invite_dm_err: User couldn't be invited to the clan because the user's direct messages are locked to receive an invitation!
clan_invite_already_sent: This user has already received an invitation!
clan_promote_member: **{}** has been demoted to regular member!
clan_icon_err: Please provide a valid url for a clan mark!
clan_disband_err: Clan can't be disbanded before all users have left the clan!
clan_create_err: Please provide a clan name to create a clan!
clan_create_err_2: This clan name is already taken! Please choose another.
clan_create_err_3: Clan name can't be longer than 30 letters!
clan_dm_locked: User couldn't receive any notification because direct messages are blocked!
clan_not_in_guild: User couldn't receive any notification because the user is no longer on the server where this request has been sent from!
matchmaking_help: To create a matchmaking room, write either *normal* where users get divided by ELO or *picking* where team leaders can pick their team members together with the command!
matchmaking_err: A regular matchmaking room has been already opened!
matchmaking_err_2: A picking matchmaking room has been already opened!
matchmaking_err_3: You have already joined a room!
matchmaking_created: Matchmaking room **{}** created and you have automatically joined the room! (1/{})
leave_err: You're currently not queueing in a room!
leave_err_2: You cannot leave the room, when the queue is full!
leave_close_room: Room has been closed because all members have left the queue!
queue_err: You need to join a room to view the queue list!
changemap_err_2: Map {} couldn't be found! Please try again!
pick_help: Write the username or mention the user together with the command to pick a user and move into your team! Note that this command can be used only if you're currently the picker.
pick_err_2: This user doesn't exist or is not inside this room!
pick_err_3: {} is already part of a team
cw_help: Challenge other clans by writing the clan name together with the command! The challenged clan has 10 minutes to reply to the challenge and during this time another challenge can't be sent! Once the challange has been accepted, use the *join* parameter to join the clan war room or use the parameter *leave* to leave it again. Once all members are gathered a deputy member will have to use the *start* parameter to start the room!
cw_challenge: Clan **{}** has challenged your clan to a clan war! React to this message to either accept or decline the challenge!
cw_err: You need to be part of a clan and be a staff member or owner of the clan to use this command!
cw_err_2: You need to be a staff member or owner of the clan to challenge another clan to a clan war!
cw_err_3: Clan doesn't exist! Please try again!
cw_err_4: Clan war challenge is currently is still being verified and another challenge can't be sent during this time!
cw_err_5: You cannot send a new clan war invitation while your clan is engaged in a clan war!
cw_err_6: This clan is currently engaged in a clan war and cannot accept another challenge invitation! Please try later again!
cw_war_accepted_2: Clan **{}** has accepted the clan war request of clan **{}**! Members of both clans can now join room number {}.
cw_war_accepted_3: Clan war request had been already accepted by another deputy member!
cw_war_declined: You have declined the clan war request of clan {}
cw_war_declined_2: Clan **{}** has declined your clan war request!
cw_war_declined_3: Clan war request has been already declined by another deputy member!
cw_war_no_room: There's no open clan war matchmaking room available to join!
cw_leave_err: You cannot leave the clan war room when it's still ongoing!
cw_start_err: You need to be inside a clan war room and be a deputy member of one of the both clans to use this command!
cw_start_err_2: The clan war room you're in has already started!
cw_start_success: The clan war in room {} has started!
room_help:
Manage all matchmaking room with this command! The following parameters are available:

- **<room number>**:
Display all details of the requested room and take actions (eg. choose the winning team).
- **ongoing**:
Display all ongoing matchmaking rooms.
room_err: The provided matchmaking room number doesn't exist! Please try again!
room_param_1: - *close*: delete the room and remove all members from the queue.
room_param_3: - *reopen*: Reopen the room and undo stats.
room_winner_help: Write either *1* for team 1 or *2* for team 2 to select the winning team of the room!
room_winner_err: Please write either 1 or 2 to select the winning team
room_winner_decided: Team {} is the winner of room {}
room_reopen: Room {} has been reopened and stats have been resetted! Status of the room has been set to Review!
stats_err: Please create a profile page before utilizing this command!
stats_rename_help: Write the new username together with the command and parameter to change your name. Note that you can't use the name of another user!
stats_rename_err: The username can't be longer than 20 letters!
stats_rename: You have been successfully renamed to **{}**
stats_server_help: Write one of the following server names together with the parameter and command to choose your main server!
stats_server_err: Provided server is not available! Please try again!
stats_server_update: Main server has been changed to **{}**
